verbose_text: The main objective of the study is to examine the hypothesis claiming a correlation between personality traits measured with the use of the Minnesota Multiphasic Personality Inventory (MMPI-2) personality questionnaire and the expression of the ERalpha (ESR1) and ERbeta (ESR2) encoding gene in patients suffering from depression.
evidence: expression of the ERalpha (ESR1) and ERbeta (ESR2
